restarter.partial_hang_warn: Due to a partial hang, this server will restart in 1 minute. Please disconnect now.
restarter.partial_hang_warn_discord: Due to a partial hang, **%{servername}** will restart in 1 minute.
restarter.schedule_warn: Server ta %{smart_count} daghighe digar restart mishavad. Lotfan Disconnect Konid. |||| Server ta %{smart_count} daghighe digar restart mishavad.
restarter.schedule_warn_discord: **%{servername}** ta %{smart_count} daghighe digar restart mishavad. |||| **%{servername}** ta %{smart_count} daghighe digar restart mishavad.

ban_messages.kick_temporary: (%{author}) Shoma Az in Server Ban Shodid, Be Dalil: "%{reason}". Etmam Ban Shoma: %{expiration}.
ban_messages.kick_permanent: (%{author}) Shoma Baraye Hamishe Az in Server Ban Shodid, Be Dalil: "%{reason}".
ban_messages.reject_temporary:
Shoma Az in Server Ban Shodid.
Etmam Ban Shoma: %{expiration}.
Ban ID: %{id}.
Dalil Ban: %{reason}.
Ban Tavasot: %{author}.
ban_messages.reject_permanent:
Shoma Az in Server Baraye Hamishe Ban Shodid.
Ban ID: %{id}.
Dalil Ban: %{reason}.
Ban Tavasot: %{author}.

server_actions.restarting: سرور درحال راه اندازی مجدد، دلیل: (%{reason}).
server_actions.restarting_discord: **%{servername}** درحال راه اندازی مجدد شدن، دلیل: (%{reason}).

nui_warning.title: WARNING
nui_warning.instruction: Dokme [SPACE] ro baraye 10 saniye negah darid ta payam rad shavad.

misc.help_message:
txAdmin Menu enabled, type /tx to open it.
You can also configure a keybind at [Game Settings > Key Bindings > FiveM > Menu: Open Main Page].
misc.menu_not_allowed:
Your identifiers do not match any admin registered on txAdmin.
If you are registered on txAdmin, go to Admin Manager and make sure your identifiers are saved.
misc.no_perms: You do not have this permission.
misc.not_enabled: The txAdmin Menu is not enabled! You can enable it in the txAdmin settings page.
misc.dialog_empty_input: You cannot have an empty input.

frozen.was_frozen: You have been frozen by a server admin!

tooltips.tooltip_1: Use %{key} to switch pages & the arrow keys to navigate menu items
tooltips.tooltip_2: Certain menu items have sub options which can be selected using the left & right arrow keys

coords.title: Coords
coords.label: Go to specified coords
coords.dialog_desc: Provide coordinates in an x, y, z format to go through the wormhole.
coords.dialog_error: Invalid coordinates. Must be in the format of: 111, 222, 33

back.title: Back
back.label: Go back to last location
back.error: You don't have a last location to go back to!

vehicle.title: Vehicle
vehicle.onesync_error: This option requires that OneSync be on for server entity handling
vehicle.not_in_veh_error: You are not currently in a vehicle!

spawn.title: Spawn
spawn.label: Spawn vehicle by model name
spawn.dialog_desc: Enter in the model name of the vehicle you want to spawn.
spawn.dialog_error: The vehicle model name '%{modelName}' does not exist!

myself.title: Myself
myself.label: Restores your health
myself.success_1: You should be feeling good now!

announcement.title: Send Announcement
announcement.label: Send an announcement to all online players.
announcement.dialog_desc: Send an announcement to all online players.

clear_area.title: Reset World Area
clear_area.label: Reset a specified world area to its default state
clear_area.dialog_desc: Please enter the radius where you wish to reset entities in (0-300). This will not clear entities spawned server side.

player_ids.title: Toggle Player IDs
player_ids.label: Toggle showing player IDs (and other info) above the head of all nearby players

misc.error: An error occurred fetching this users details. The error is shown below:
misc.target_not_found: Was unable to find an online player with ID or an username of %{target}

dm_dialog.title: Direct Message
dm_dialog.description: What is the reason for direct messaging this player?

warn_dialog.title: Warn
warn_dialog.description: What is the reason for direct warning this player?

kick_dialog.title: Kick
kick_dialog.description: What is the reason for kicking this player?
